io.atomix.storage.buffer

Class NativeBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.storage.buffer.AbstractBuffer
      • io.atomix.storage.buffer.NativeBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buffer, BufferInput<Buffer>, BufferOutput<Buffer>, BytesInput<Buffer>, BytesOutput<Buffer>, ReferenceCounted<Buffer>, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnsafeDirectBuffer, UnsafeMappedBuffer

    public abstract class NativeBuffer
extends AbstractBuffer
    Native byte buffer implementation.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
